product.title: KeJieShunCheng 2-in-1 Multi-Function Hair Brush (Straightening and Curling), instyler Dual Purpose Automatic Straightening or Curling Magic, Professional Hot Brush Styling Flat Iron Hairdressing Tool
product.title_excluding_brand: 2-in-1 Multi-Function Hair Brush (Straightening and Curling), instyler Dual Purpose Automatic Straightening or Curling Magic, Professional Hot Brush Styling Flat Iron Hairdressing Tool
product.description: The 2 in 1 Multi - Functional Hairbrush is a revolutionary styling tool that combines the capabilities of straightening and curling into one convenient device. Say goodbye to the hassle of juggling multiple hair styling tools, as this innovative product streamlines your haircare routine.​ Designed with precision, the hairbrush features a unique barrel and bristle configuration. The bristles are carefully engineered to glide smoothly through your hair, detangling it gently while the heating elements work their magic. The instyler Dual Purpose Automatic Straightening or Curling Magic mechanism is truly a game - changer. With a simple flick of the wrist, you can transform your hair from straight to wavy or vice versa.​ This professional - grade hot brush styling flat iron hairdressing tool comes equipped with an adjustable heater. Whether you have fine, delicate hair or thick, coarse locks, you can customize the temperature to suit your hair type. The temperature range typically spans from a gentle heat suitable for sensitive hair to a higher heat setting for those with more stubborn curls or waves. This ensures that you can achieve the perfect style without causing damage to your precious tresses.​ The device heats up rapidly, saving you valuable time in the morning rush. It also has a built - in safety feature, such as an automatic shut - off after a certain period of inactivity, giving you peace of mind while using it. The ergonomic handle provides a comfortable grip, allowing for easy maneuverability around your head, ensuring that you can reach every strand with ease.
product.description_html:
The 2 in 1 Multi - Functional Hairbrush is a revolutionary styling tool that combines the capabilities of straightening and curling into one convenient device. Say goodbye to the hassle of juggling multiple hair styling tools, as this innovative product streamlines your haircare routine.​
Designed with precision, the hairbrush features a unique barrel and bristle configuration. The bristles are carefully engineered to glide smoothly through your hair, detangling it gently while the heating elements work their magic. The instyler Dual Purpose Automatic Straightening or Curling Magic mechanism is truly a game - changer. With a simple flick of the wrist, you can transform your hair from straight to wavy or vice versa.​
This professional - grade hot brush styling flat iron hairdressing tool comes equipped with an adjustable heater. Whether you have fine, delicate hair or thick, coarse locks, you can customize the temperature to suit your hair type. The temperature range typically spans from a gentle heat suitable for sensitive hair to a higher heat setting for those with more stubborn curls or waves. This ensures that you can achieve the perfect style without causing damage to your precious tresses.​
The device heats up rapidly, saving you valuable time in the morning rush. It also has a built - in safety feature, such as an automatic shut - off after a certain period of inactivity, giving you peace of mind while using it. The ergonomic handle provides a comfortable grip, allowing for easy maneuverability around your head, ensuring that you can reach every strand with ease.
product.description_full:
The 2 in 1 Multi - Functional Hairbrush is a revolutionary styling tool that combines the capabilities of straightening and curling into one convenient device. Say goodbye to the hassle of juggling multiple hair styling tools, as this innovative product streamlines your haircare routine.​ Designed with precision, the hairbrush features a unique barrel and bristle configuration. The bristles are carefully engineered to glide smoothly through your hair, detangling it gently while the heating elements work their magic. The instyler Dual Purpose Automatic Straightening or Curling Magic mechanism is truly a game - changer. With a simple flick of the wrist, you can transform your hair from straight to wavy or vice versa.​ This professional - grade hot brush styling flat iron hairdressing tool comes equipped with an adjustable heater. Whether you have fine, delicate hair or thick, coarse locks, you can customize the temperature to suit your hair type. The temperature range typically spans from a gentle heat suitable for sensitive hair to a higher heat setting for those with more stubborn curls or waves. This ensures that you can achieve the perfect style without causing damage to your precious tresses.​ The device heats up rapidly, saving you valuable time in the morning rush. It also has a built - in safety feature, such as an automatic shut - off after a certain period of inactivity, giving you peace of mind while using it. The ergonomic handle provides a comfortable grip, allowing for easy maneuverability around your head, ensuring that you can reach every strand with ease. * Dual Functionality: Seamlessly combines straightening and curling functions, eliminating the need for multiple styling tools.
 * Automatic Styling Magic: The instyler mechanism enables effortless transformation between straight and curly styles with a simple movement.
 * Adjustable Heater: Allows customization of temperature according to different hair types, reducing the risk of hair damage.
 * Rapid Heating: Heats up quickly, saving time during your daily styling routine.
 * Safety and Comfort: Features an automatic shut - off for safety and an ergonomic handle for comfortable use.

The 2 in 1 Multi - Functional Hairbrush is a revolutionary styling tool that combines the capabilities of straightening and curling into one convenient device. Say goodbye to the hassle of juggling multiple hair styling tools, as this innovative product streamlines your haircare routine.​ Designed with precision, the hairbrush features a unique barrel and bristle configuration. The instyler Dual Purpose Automatic Straightening or Curling Magic mechanism is truly a game - changer. Whether you have fine, delicate hair or thick, coarse locks, you can customize the temperature to suit your hair type. The temperature range typically spans from a gentle heat suitable for sensitive hair to a higher heat setting for those with more stubborn curls or waves. This ensures that you can achieve the perfect style without causing damage to your precious tresses.​ The device heats up rapidly, saving you valuable time in the morning rush. protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 3-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
